mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.customer_id AS "customer.id", customer.user_name AS "customer.userName", a.questionnaire_id AS "questionnaire.id", questionnaire.title AS "questionnaire.title", a.answer_time AS "answerTime"
LEFT JOIN ec_customer customer ON customer.id = a.customer_id LEFT JOIN ec_questionnaire questionnaire ON questionnaire.id = a.questionnaire_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ec_answer_sheet a
ORDER BY a.create_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_answer_sheet( id, customer_id, questionnaire_id, answer_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customer.id}, #{questionnaire.id}, NOW() )
